get.description: Returns a collection of metric tracking data for computer applications.

parameters.name: page_number
parameters.description: The page number.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The maximum number of items in the response.

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description:
The fields which you can use to filter the results. Format of the query string parameter:
```
?filter=<filter name> <operator> <value>
```
Filter name | Description | Data type | Example
:--- | --- | --- | ---

For more information on the available operators and which data types those operators work on, see [Filter API call results](https://docs.snowsoftware.io/snow-atlas-api/resources/get-started-with-apis/api-conventions#filter-api-call-results).

PaginationResponse.description: Generic response class for the pagination part. Properties are annotated using DataMemberAttribute so that we're aligned with REST style guide regarding the json payload.

rel.description: Specifies the relationship between the current document and the linked document/resource.

method.description: The method to access related resources.

_links.description: A collection of links to related resources.

allOf.description: Response class for Computer application metric tracking.

computerId.description: The unique ID of the computer.

metricId.description: The unique ID of the metric used.

applicationId.description: The unique ID of the application.

initialRequirement.description: The initial requirement of the metric.

includedInBundle.description: The number of applications included in the bundle.

outsideMetricPeriod.description: The number of computers outside of the metric period.

secondaryUseRightsDesktopLaptop.description: The number of computers with secondary use rights for a desktop or laptop.

secondaryUseRightsDevice.description: The number of computers with secondary use rights for a device.

extendedCoverageForDcc.description: The number of computers with extended coverage for DCC.

extendedCoverageForHost.description: The number of computers with extended coverage for host.

multipleVersionEdition.description: The number of computers with multiple version editions.

virtualDesktopInfrastructure.description: The number of computers with virtual desktop infrastructure.

minimumRequirement.description: The minimum requirement for the metric.

coreFactor.description: The core factor of the computer for the metric.

physicalHost.description: The physical host of the application for the metric.

computerAppExclusions.description: The number of computers which have application exclusions.

windowsServer.description: The number of computers which are Windows servers.

virtualMachine.description: The number of computers which are virtual machines.

unknownPhysicalHost.description: The number of computers with an unknown physical host.

manuallyExcluded.description: The number of computers manually excluded.

requirementMoved.description: The number of computers with the requirements moved.

windowsServerFlag.description: The number of computers with the Windows Server flag.

sqlServer.description: The number of computers with the SQL Server flag.

allOf.description: Generic response class supporting filtering and including links.

items.description: A collection of items returned in the response.

allOf.description: Response class for computer applications.

computerId.description: The unique ID of the computer.

applicationId.description: The unique ID of the application.

bundleApplicationId.description: The unique ID of the application bundle, or product suite, for a given application.

firstDiscovered.description: The date when the application was first discovered on the computer.

lastUsed.description: The date when the application was last used on the computer.

usedCount.description: The number of times the application was used on the computer.

averageUsedTime.description: The average time the application was used in hours.

isVirtual.description: ```true``` if the application is virtual; otherwise, ```false```.

isInstalled.description: ```true``` if the application is installed on the computer; otherwise, ```false```.

bundleUsagePercentage.description: The proportion of the application bundle that is used in percentage.

unbundled.description: ```true``` if the application is unbundled; otherwise, ```false```.

items.description: A collection of items returned in the response.

applicationId.description: The unique ID of the application.

lastUsed.description: The date when the application was last used on the computer.

usedCount.description: The number of times the application was used on the computer.

usedUser.description: The number of users who used the application on the computer.

usedMinutes.description: The number of minutes the application was used on the computer.

usedDays.description: The number of days the application was used on the computer.

isInstalled.description: ```true``` if the application is installed on the computer; otherwise, ```false```.

isOEM.description: ```true``` if the application is OEM; otherwise, ```false```.

isMSDN.description: ```true``` if the application is MSDN; otherwise, ```false```.

isVirtual.description: ```true``` if the application is virtual; otherwise, ```false```.

isOverridden.description: ```true``` if the application is overridden; otherwise, ```false```.

packageGUID.description: The unique ID of the application package.

isRecognized.description: ```true``` if the application is recognized; otherwise, ```false```.

isRegistry.description: ```true``` if the application is in the registry; otherwise, ```false```.

averageUsedTime.description: The average time the application is used in hours.

unbundled.description: ```true``` if the application is licenced individualy; otherwise, ```false```.

purchaseDate.description: The date on which the computer was purchased.

purchaseValueBase.description: The value base of the purchase of the computer.

purchaseCurrency.description: The currency in which the computer was purchased.

name.description: The name of the display adapter.

maxResolution.description: The maximum resolution of the computer's display adapter.

name.description: The name of the computer's drive.

allOf.description: Response representing details of hardware of a computer.

computerId.description: The unique ID of the computer.

processorCount.description: The number of processors in the computer.

coreCount.description: The number of cores in the computer.

processorType.description: The type of processors in the computer.

processorSpeed.description: The speed of the processor in the computer in MHz.

memorySlots.description: The total number of memory slots in the computer.

memorySlotsAvailable.description: The number of available memory slots in the computer.

physicalMemory.description: The amount of physical memory in the computer.

systemDiskSpace.description: The total amount of system disk space in the computer in MB.

systemDiskSpaceAvailable.description: The amount of available system disk space in the computer in MB.

totalDiskSpace.description: The total amount of disk space in the computer in MB.

totalDiskSpaceAvailable.description: The amount of available disk space in the computer in MB.

totalDiskSpaceUsed.description: The total amount of disk space used in the computer in MB.

socketCount.description: The number of sockets in the computer.

isSocketCountManualOverrideEnabled.description: ```true``` if the socket count manual override of the computer is enabled; otherwise, ```false```.

chipModulesPerProcessor.description: The number of chip modules per processor.

processorManufacturer.description: The manufacturer of the computer's processors.

logicalProcessorCount.description: The number of logical processors in the computer.

allOf.description: Response representing a logical disks of a computer.

computerId.description: The unique ID of the computer.

204.description: No Content: Your request succeeded, but the response message was empty.

400.description: Bad Request: Your request is invalid or improperly formed. Consequently, the API server could not understand your request.

error.message: Filter field name needs to be formatted as a string.

404.description: Not Found: The operation you requested failed because a resource associated with your request could not be found.

500.description: Internal Server Error: Your request failed due to an internal error.

error.message: The service encountered an unexpected condition that prevented it from fulfilling the request.
